installments-conditions.title: Review and Confirm Installments
installments-conditions.programName: Program Name: UX/UI Design Diploma with Installment Payments
installments-conditions.termsIntro: By paying the first installment for Lxera programs, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms:
terms.body: By completing the payment for any installment, the user is considered to have agreed to all the listed terms and conditions.

terms.title: 2. Payment Schedule:
terms.body: The user must adhere to paying all agreed-upon installments on the specified dates according to the schedule.

terms.title: 3. Late Payment:
terms.body: In case of payment delay, Lxera reserves the right to take appropriate measures to ensure completion of payments, including freezing the program or restricting access to learning materials.

terms.title: 4. Refund Policy:
terms.body: No payment can be refunded except in special circumstances evaluated by the Lxera administration.

terms.title: 5. Program Access:
terms.body: Access to the educational program is granted upon successful completion of the first installment.

terms.title: 6. Reminder Notification:
terms.body: Notifications will be sent prior to each due date to avoid any delay or service interruption.

terms.title: 7. Communication & Support:
terms.body: Subscribers can contact the Lxera support team for inquiries regarding payments or terms.

installments-conditions.importantNote: Important: By proceeding with the payment, you fully and irrevocably agree to all the terms and conditions, and you commit to complying with them to ensure continued access to Lxera services.

techSupport.faq-title: Frequently Asked Questions About Support Tickets

faqs.q1: How can I open a new support ticket?
faqs.a1: You can open a new support ticket by clicking the 'Create Support Ticket' button and filling in the required details.

faqs.q2: Can I edit the ticket after sending it?
faqs.a2: Yes, you can edit your ticket after submitting it, but only until it receives a response from the support team.

faqs.q3: When should I expect a response to the ticket?
faqs.a3: You will typically receive a response within 24 to 48 business hours depending on the ticket type and priority.

faqs.q4: What’s the difference between ticket types (technical, financial, training)?
faqs.a4: Technical tickets are for system or login issues, financial tickets relate to payments and billing, and training tickets are for course-related inquiries.

faqs.q5: What’s the difference between ticket types (technical, financial, training)?
faqs.a5: Technical tickets are for system or login issues, financial tickets relate to payments and billing, and training tickets are for course-related inquiries.

faqs.q6: What’s the difference between ticket types (technical, financial, training)?
faqs.a6: Technical tickets are for system or login issues, financial tickets relate to payments and billing, and training tickets are for course-related inquiries.
